feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250614-e3307c58
entry.content:
• f16cd63c restored backwards compatibility for emby 4.8.x by arabcoders
  • 833d690b relax emby version match to 4.8 by arabcoders
  • 1c6fe050 Log more data when webhook fails to be parsed or matched to a user. And identify emby clients by version. by arabcoders
  • f83b32f2 updated packages and clarified some webhooks limitations. by arabcoders
  • 10301c6b minor changelog page and packages updates. by arabcoders
  • cbc5d147 Improve the kill process, by using SIGTERM first. by arabcoders
  • fc3f41ae Better control over the scheduler restart process. by arabcoders
  • 1902ac82 Remove references to MemoryMapper in preparation to remove it later from the system. by arabcoders
  • c5040951 use SIGKILL for stopping the process. by arabcoders
  • 945d2634 packages updates. and minor UI updates. by arabcoders
  • 14a27cfb fix notification for killing a process. by arabcoders
  • 63003b91 center the kill process button. by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for WatchState: v0.1.1
entry.content:
• ad19e85 fix README typo by Alessandro Spisso
  • 7572565 Merge pull request #691 from ilGianfri/patch-1 by Abdulmohsen
  • e3f48eb Add the ability to serve static files from api endpoint. by arabcoders
  • f74d785 switch to semver. by arabcoders
  • 6991958 convert request.js to ts by arabcoders
  • a1b7859 Update external dependencies by arabcoders
  • 4addaac Merge pull request #692 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for WatchState: v0.1.2

• 34e476a external packages update by arabcoders
  • f007b8a Possible fix for #694 by arabcoders
  • bbd4ad6 Merge pull request #695 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for WatchState: v0.1.3
entry.content:
• 45d61a1 Re-implemented a way to disable matching via episodes GUIDs. by arabcoders
  • 51305d7 Merge pull request #698 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for WatchState: v0.1.4
entry.content:
• aec20b8 Added Path to handle pathing logic. by arabcoders
  • 8cb2d9f Fixes some expectations by arabcoders
  • 283f78b Fixed incorrect normalizing path in windows by arabcoders
  • 945aaa8 In rare cases, jellyfin doesn't reset the PlaybackPositionTicks by arabcoders
  • f8256fc Minor fixes for Path class by arabcoders
  • 1a8c5bb Merge pull request #699 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
